00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include "cinder/Cinder.h"
00026 #include "cinder/app/Event.h"
00027 
00028 #include <vector>
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00031 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00032 
00034 class FileDropEvent : public Event {
00035   public:
00036     FileDropEvent( int aX, int aY, const std::vector<std::string> &aFiles )
00037         : Event(), mX( aX ), mY( aY ), mFiles( aFiles )
00038     {}
00039     
00041     int         getX() const { return mX; }
00043     int         getY() const { return mY; }
00045     Vec2i       getPos() const { return Vec2i( mX, mY ); }
00046 
00048     const std::vector<std::string>& getFiles() const { return mFiles; }
00050     size_t                          getNumFiles() const { return mFiles.size(); }
00052     const std::string&              getFile( size_t index ) const { return mFiles.at(index); }
00053 
00054   private:
00055     int                         mX, mY;
00056     std::vector<std::string>    mFiles;
00057 };
00058 
00059 } } // namespace cinder::app
